00010 #if !defined(MATRIX_DYNAMIC_H)
00011 #define MATRIX_DYNAMIC_H
00012 
00013 #include <cmath>
00014 
00015 //  matrix<D>: a DxD matrix
00016 template <unsigned D, typename num = double> class matrix {
00017 public:
00018   matrix<D, num> (bool random = false);
00019   matrix<D, num> (const num a[D][D]);
00020   matrix<D, num> (unsigned axis1, unsigned axis2, num alpha);
00021 
00022   double &operator () (unsigned i, unsigned j) {
00023     return M[i][j]; }
00024   double operator () (unsigned i, unsigned j) const {
00025     return M[i][j]; }
00026 
00027   matrix<D, num> operator * (const matrix<D, num> &) const;
00028 
00029   matrix<D, num> operator - ();
00030 
00031   void print ();
00032 
00033 protected:
00034   num M[D][D];
00035 };
00036 
00037 
00038 /*******************************************************************************
00039  *  default constructor: creates a unity DxD matrix
00040  */
00041 template<unsigned D, typename num> matrix<D, num>::matrix (bool random) {
00042   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {                                    //      i: row
00043     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)                            //      j: col
00044       M[i][j] = random? num (rand ())/RAND_MAX: 0;
00045     if (!random) M[i][i] = 1;
00046   }
00047 }
00048 
00049 /*******************************************************************************
00050  *  creates a rotation about axes ii and jj of angle Theta
00051  *  @param ii   first (row) index
00052  *  @param jj   second (column) index
00053  *  @param Theta  rotation angle
00054  */
00055 template<unsigned D, typename num> 
00056     matrix<D, num>::matrix (unsigned ii, unsigned jj, num Theta) {
00057   num c = cos (Theta), s = sin (Theta);
00058   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {          //  i: row
00059     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)        //  j: col
00060       M[i][j] = 0;
00061     M[i][i] = 1;
00062   }
00063   M[ii][ii] =  M[jj][jj] = c;
00064   M[ii][jj] = -s;
00065   M[jj][ii] = s;
00066 }
00067 
00068 template<unsigned D, typename num> 
00069     matrix<D, num>::matrix (const num a[D][D]) {
00070       for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00071         for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++)
00072           M[i][j] = a[i][j];
00073     }
00074 
00075 /*******************************************************************************
00076  *  matrix multiplication
00077  *  @param B    matrix to multiply with
00078  *  @return     *this * B
00079  */
00080 template <unsigned D, typename num>
00081     inline matrix<D, num> 
00082         matrix<D, num>::operator * (const matrix<D, num> &B) const {
00083   matrix<D, num> C;
00084   for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                                      //      i: row
00085     for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {                          //      j: col
00086       num s = 0;
00087       for (unsigned k = 0; k < D; k++)
00088         s += M[i][k]*B.M[k][j];
00089       C.M[i][j] = s;
00090     }
00091   return C;
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 /*******************************************************************************
00096  *  matrix negation
00097  *  @return     - *this
00098  */
00099 template <unsigned D, typename num>
00100     inline matrix<D, num> 
00101         matrix<D, num>::operator - () {
00102           matrix<D> B (*this);
00103           for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)                                      //      i: row
00104             for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) {                          //      j: col
00105               B.M[i][j] = -M[i][j];
00106             }
00107           return B;
00108         }

00110 #include <sstream>
00111 #include <iomanip>

00114 /*******************************************************************************
00115  *  output, mainly for debugging purposes
00116  */
00117 template <unsigned D, typename num>
00118   void 
00119     matrix<D, num>::print () {
00120       std::cout << D << "x" << D << ":";
00121       for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00122         std::cout << (i > 0? " |": "") << std::endl << "|";
00123         for (unsigned j = 0; j < D; j++) 
00124           std::cout << std::setw (6) << std::setprecision (3) << operator ()(i, j);
00125       }
00126       std::cout << " |" << std::endl;
00127     }
